mapper.select:
select s.id as subjectId,s.name as subjectName,s.user_id as userId ,pointCount,choiceCount,judgementCount,blankCount,shortAnswerCount from subject s,(select sbj.id,count(single.id) as choiceCount from subject sbj left join single as single on sbj.id =single.subject_id and single.status = 0 group by sbj.id) choiceCounts, (select sbj.id,count(point.id) as pointCount from subject sbj left join knowledge_point point on sbj.id = point.subject_id and point.status = 0 group by sbj.id) pointCounts,(select sbj.id, count(judge.id) as judgementCount from subject sbj left join judgement as judge on sbj.id =judge.subject_id and judge.status = 0 group by sbj.id) judgementCounts,(select sbj.id,count(b.id) as blankCount from subject sbj left join blank as b on sbj.id =b.subject_id and b.status = 0 group by sbj.id) blankCounts,(select sbj.id,count(short.id) as shortAnswerCount from subject sbj left join short_answer as short on sbj.id =short.subject_id and short.status = 0 group by sbj.id) shortAnswerCounts
and s.name like concat('%', #{subjectVo.name}, '%')
and choiceCounts.id = s.id and pointCounts.id = s.id and judgementCounts.id = s.id and blankCounts.id = s.id and shortAnswerCounts.id = s.id and s.status = 0
